about_the_game: The soundtrack to Eternights was created by Spencer Bambrick of Serial Lab Studios. Spencer's score is full of genre-bending motifs and experimental musical textures. From Lo-fi, to synth wave, to cinematic/orchestral and glitch horror — the soundtrack weaves together genres to match the post-apocalyptic tale of love, friendship, and adventure in Eternights.
